document_data.name: Fariba
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fariba''' was a devoted worshiper of [[Ilmater]] who collected donations to aid the struggling poor folk of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''One thousand...! With this, we could take care of all the needy in the entire Docks District for a year! You are much too kind! Ilmater bless youâ€”for all that you've done! Thank you!''|Fariba of Ilmater}}
document_data.Description: Fariba was a [[human]] woman with blonde hair and brown eyes. She wore a simple dress while collecting money for her cause.
document_data.History: After the wars of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, and the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the [[Sword Coast North]] suffered greatly. The city of Neverwinter's commerce was struggling to recover while its poor inhabitants in the [[Neverwinter/Docks District|Docks District]] were hit the hardest by the strife. Fariba spent her days in the [[Crossroad Keep]], accosting everyone she came across, asking for donations aimed at helping Neveren citizens. Despite her best attempts, the donation purse only held scant [[copper]]s.
